english.segment1: (Whatchoo lookin at?!?!). (Keep your tongue behind your teeth, man..)
english.segment2: The loosest of cannons. The loosest of screws. Monkey in the wrench, baby. I love what I do.
english.segment3: It's the end of the world. So beautiful and so pure. Keep your diamonds and gold. We'll watch it all unfold and come undone.
english.segment4: (Open up on you like a flower). (I can go all day!)
english.segment5: I'm the horn - not the bull, see?. I'm the ache in the tooth. Pain in your assssssskin' for it!. Not a thing you can do.
english.segment6: (Ugly as a mud fence). (Whatchoo lookin at?!?!). (A face no mother could love!)
